attributes.action: Reduce the central funding given to Scotland and Wales, in direct proportion to the cost of goods and services provided free in those countries, but for which we in England have to pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Specifically university tuition fees, eye tests and other medical services once free on the NHS.
It cannot be equitable for the Regional Assemblies / Parliaments to have the power to pass legislation to provide services free which will be heavily subsidised by the English taxpayer. Those same taxpayers are faced with the double burden of funding their largess, whilst also having to pay through the nose for those same services themselves.
